get.description: Search for payments by transaction hash, wallet address, payment reference, request ID, or merchant reference. Supports filtering by payment type, currencies, date ranges, and pagination. Returns complete payment details including customer information and fees. When searching by transaction hash or wallet address, returns ALL payments from batch transactions. Most search parameters are optional, but at least one must be provided and they default to an AND relationship.

parameters.name: x-api-key
parameters.description: API key for authentication (optional if using Client ID)

parameters.name: x-client-id
parameters.description: Client ID for frontend authentication (optional if using API key)

parameters.name: Origin
parameters.description: Origin header (required for Client ID auth, automatically set by browser)

parameters.name: txHash
parameters.description: Search by blockchain transaction hash (source or destination). Returns ALL payments from the same transaction, including batch payments. Must be a valid 66-character hex string starting with '0x'. Example: '0x1234567890abcdef...'

parameters.name: walletAddress
parameters.description: Search by Ethereum wallet address (payer or payee). Returns ALL payments involving this address, including batch payments where the address is either sender or recipient. Example: '0x6923831ACf5c327260D7ac7C9DfF5b1c3cB3C7D7'

parameters.name: paymentReference
parameters.description: Search by unique payment reference generated by the Request Network. This is the hex identifier used for on-chain payments. Example: '0xb3581f0b0f74cc61'

parameters.name: requestId
parameters.description: Search by Request Network request ID. This is the unique identifier for the payment request. Example: '01e273ecc29d4b526df3a0f1f05ffc59372af8752c2b678096e49ac270416a7cdb'

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: Search by your custom merchant reference used for receipt tracking and order identification. This is the reference you provided when creating the payment. Example: 'ORDER-2024-001234' or 'INV-5678'

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter by payment type: 'direct' (same currency), 'conversion' (currency conversion), 'crosschain' (cross-chain payment), 'recurring' (subscription payment)

parameters.name: invoiceCurrency
parameters.description: Invoice Currency ID, from the [Request Network Token List](https://docs.request.network/general/request-network-token-list) e.g: USD

parameters.name: paymentCurrency
parameters.description: Payment currency ID, from the [Request Network Token List](https://docs.request.network/general/request-network-token-list) e.g: ETH-sepolia-sepolia

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: Filter payments from this date (inclusive). Must be in ISO 8601 format in UTC (ending with 'Z'). Example: '2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z'

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: Filter payments until this date (inclusive). Must be in ISO 8601 format in UTC (ending with 'Z'). Must be after fromDate if both are provided. Example: '2024-01-31T23:59:59.999Z'

200.description: Payment search results with comprehensive payment data and pagination metadata

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the payment was processed

conversionRateDestination.description: Conversion rate used for destination currency

fees.description: Array of fees associated with the payment

stage.description: Stage when the fee is applied

recurringPaymentId.description: ID of the recurring payment this payment belongs to

rateProvider.description: Provider used for exchange rate data

hasBeenPaid.description: Whether the request has been fully paid

total.description: Total number of payments matching the search criteria

post.description: Initiate a payment without having to create a request first. Supports both one-time and recurring payments. For recurring payments, specify the recurrence object with start date, frequency, total executions, and payer address. The system will create a recurring payment schedule and return the necessary transactions for allowance approval and signature submission. Optionally includes customer information (firstName, lastName, email, address) and a merchant reference field for checkout widget implementations and receipt tracking.

requests.description: A list of payment requests to be created andprocessed in batch. All requests must be on the same network and contain payment/invoice currency information. Either `requests` or `requestIds` must be provided, but not both.

requestIds.description: The request IDs of the existing requests to be paid. Requests must be on the same network. Either `requests` or `requestIds` must be provided, but not both.

payer.description: The wallet address of the payer, user to check if approval is needed or not.

ERC20ApprovalTransactions.description: Array of ERC20 approval transactions needed before the batch payment. Only present when token approval is required.

data.description: Transaction calldata for the ERC20 approval

to.description: Target ERC20 token contract address for approval

ERC20BatchPaymentTransaction.description: The batch payment transaction for ERC20 tokens. Only present when the batch contains ERC20 payments.

data.description: Transaction calldata for the ERC20 batch payment

hex.description: Payment amount in EVM-compatible format, encoded in hex. Usually 0 for ERC20 payments

ETHBatchPaymentTransaction.description: The batch payment transaction for native ETH. Only present when the batch contains ETH payments.

data.description: Transaction calldata for the ETH batch payment

hex.description: Payment amount in EVM-compatible format, encoded in hex. Contains the ETH value to send

400.description: Requests must be on the same network

value.message: All requests must be on the same network

post.description: Submit a signature for a recurring payment permit to activate the recurring payment schedule. This endpoint is called after creating a recurring payment and obtaining the permit data. The signature authorizes the recurring payment contract to execute payments on behalf of the payer according to the schedule. Once activated, payments will be executed automatically at the specified intervals.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the recurring payment

parameters.name: x-api-key
parameters.description: API key for authentication (optional if using Client ID)

parameters.name: x-client-id
parameters.description: Client ID for frontend authentication (optional if using API key)

parameters.name: Origin
parameters.description: Origin header (required for Client ID auth, automatically set by browser)

permitSignature.description: The signature of the recurring payment permit.

get.description: Retrieve the current status and execution details of a recurring payment. Returns information about executed payments, remaining executions, next payment date, and overall status. This endpoint is useful for monitoring recurring payment progress and checking if payments are being executed as expected. Note: Customer information (PII) is not included in the response for security reasons.
